adjective.description: Of or based on the meter as a unit of length; relating to the metric system.
examples: all measurements are given in metric form

adjective.description: Relating to or denoting a metric.

noun.description: A system or standard of measurement.
Metric units, or the metric system.
examples: it's easier to work in metric

origin: Late 15th century (denoting the branch of study dealing with meter): via Latin from Greek metrikos, from metron (see metre).
